message.name: NO_SOURCE_CODE
message.content: Sorry, the given URL has no source code

message.name: INVALID_URL
message.content: Sorry, this does not look like a valid URL

message.name: CRAWLER_LOCALHOST_SCAN_NOT_ALLOWED
message.content: Scanning localhost is not allowed

message.name: NO_RESPONSE
message.content: The given URL does not respond

message.name: CRAWLER_PORT_DISALLOWED
message.content: Sorry, I am not able to communicate on that port

message.name: CRAWLER_DONT_LEAK_USER_CREDS
message.content: You should not tell me your username/password for other services

message.name: CRAWLER_JSON_DECODE_ERROR
message.content: Given JSON could not be decoded

message.name: CRAWLER_REDIRECT_ERROR
message.content: URL does a forbidden redirect

message.name: UNSUPPORTED_PROTOCOL
message.content: The Website is using a protocol which is not supported

message.name: FAILED_INIT
message.content: Crawler failed to initialize the connection

message.name: URL_MALFORMAT
message.content: URL is not properly formatted

message.name: COULDNT_RESOLVE_HOST
message.content: The given remote host was not resolved

message.name: COULDNT_CONNECT
message.content: Failed to connect to host or proxy

message.name: REMOTE_ACCESS_DENIED
message.content: Access to the resource given in the URL was denied

message.name: HTTP2_ERROR
message.content: A problem was detected in the HTTP2 framing layer

message.name: TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS
message.content: There were too many redirects

message.name: SEND_ERROR
message.content: Failed sending network data

message.name: BAD_CONTENT_ENCODING
message.content: Unrecognized transfer encoding

message.name: SSL_ENGINE_INITFAILED
message.content: Initiating the SSL Engine failed

message.name: TIMEOUT
message.content: The specified timeout period was reached according to the conditions

message.name: CONV_FAILED
message.content: Character conversion failed

message.name: REMOTE_FILE_NOT_FOUND
message.content: The resource referenced in the URL does not exist

message.name: HTTP2_STREAM
message.content: Stream error in the HTTP/2 framing layer
